attributes.action: Standard Accommodation for MP's and Lords
attributes.additional_details: Call on the House to source or build a permanent residence accommodation for MP's and Lords to stay in whilst in London. This accommodation should be allocated to MP's as part of their induction and serve their basic needs providing accommodation, internet/phone facilities and catering. This accommodation should be located as close as possible to Whitehall. This will eliminate all expenses for accommodation in London and standardise the services recieved.
